description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Adele，独立歌手，格莱美奖宠儿，首位全英音乐奖评审团奖得主。Adele表示自己受美国爵士、蓝调歌手埃塔·詹姆丝与“爵士乐第一夫人”艾拉·费兹洁拉的影响，并形容自己的音乐风格是“心碎的灵魂”(Heartbroken Soul)。她以首张专辑《19》获得水星音乐奖提名，并在英国专辑排行榜上得到第一名佳绩；该专辑并以在英国超过200万、全球超过700万的销售量获得7x白金销售认证。专辑《21》在全球销量突破1800万。世界范围内共销售2600万张唱片。2012年被美国《人物》评选为全球最美女性第14位。

This is the end 事已至此
Hold your breath and count to ten 屏住呼吸，倒数十次
Feel the Earth move and then 感受地球的转动
Hear my heart burst again 再听听我心跳的声音
For this is the end 这是末日
I've drowned and dreamt this moment 我沉浸、梦想过的时刻
So overdue I owe them 姗姗来迟
Swept away I'm stolen 将我带走

讲解：

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Skyfall

description:
Still that doesn't mean there's nothing to talk about. I've been discussing the latest jobs figures from the US Department of Labour with Justin Urquhart Stewart of Seven Investment Management and it's a downturn, I noted, after many months of good figures.

It is. The figures are on average and this is where you have to look at these, and these are non-farm payroll figures as I used to take out all the agricultural workers and the part-time workers involved in that. And you have to look at the trend and the trend has been pretty strong recently - about 250,000 new jobs a month - and this is what we were expecting again. Now but actually over the past few weeks a lot of the indicators have been still rising but actually at a slower rate. So again we've got more jobs being created but at a much lower level, now only 126,000 as opposed to 250,000. So if the market was open today I suspect that actually would have had to put pretty bit of a poll on the market. So it'll be interesting to see actually what happens on Monday morning if this has carried true.

And do you, what factors do you think underpin that drop?

What you're seeing now is although you've got the economy doing quite well, what you've seen is a big impact on those companies which are exporting. The strength of the dollar is really hurting some of those companies. So anybody who's got a potential business going outside - and increasingly America has been doing that - will now find an extra cost to some 15%, plus the fact - the pressure offs those emerging nations as well who are also suffering the other side of that. Their currencies are now really rather weak. 

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<
